bibl.title: Copy of a Request for Registration of a Sale.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I
bibl.author: Weinstein, Marcia E.

bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. Petition to Aurelios Ammonios alias Apollonios, strategus of the Oxyrhynchite nome, preceded by the strategus' letter forwarding it to the property registrars. After 22 May A.D. 241 [= P. Oxy. XLVII, 3365].
Weinstein Marcia E., Copy of a Request for Registration of a Sale.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I (Bonn, 1976) pp. 381-405.
